title: Joeyp
author: Joeyp
content: Everyone who defecates in the unique throne in exchange will get 10 Ggool reward. The Ggool may already be used to purchase various items - various retail options, including coffee shops, noodle restaurants, and book stores.So very simple way to get crypto.Link: https://www.techjuice.pk/south-korean-professor-invents-toilet-that-turns-poop-into-cryptocurrency/

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Joeyp on September 30, 2023, 01:26:06 PMEveryone who defecates in the unique throne in exchange will get 10 Ggool reward. The Ggool may already be used to purchase various items - various retail options, including coffee shops, noodle restaurants, and book stores.So very simple way to get crypto.Link: https://www.techjuice.pk/south-korean-professor-invents-toilet-that-turns-poop-into-cryptocurrency/This is old news from around 2021, actually the idea created by Professor Cho is a great idea which uses things that people consider useless to become valuable. Apart from the link you provided, there are lots of mainstream media platforms that report this too, including: Reuters, Analytic Insight, Decrypt and Cointelegraph.FYI, this project has been discontinued since February last year, so actually there is nothing more we can discuss regarding the development or continuation of this project.

comments.author: JeromeTash

Most of these shitcoins don't not solve any current world problems and have no use cases.
